name: Totem City
description:
Genres: visual novel, ecchi, comedy, steampunk, sci-fi, ADV
(illustrated novel with multiple endings, that greatly depend on player's choice)

Lenght: 3-4 hours

The second game of the "Stop the Earth, I'm getting off!" series.

The next story about the guy who travels between worlds in a very peculiar way. He changes bodies with his double when he has sex with special girls. The protagonist is now looking for his home world (our planet Earth) after visiting a high-tech world. This world is called the Crystal City. His journey begins in the Totem City - a place full of steampunk, demons, and unpleasant policies for ordinary citizens. But people who live here have features of totem animals: ears, tails and sharp teeth can look very cute. It will quite a task to get attention of such girls. But it must be done as there is only one way he can get home. And it is sex.

It's up to you to find the right way for the story to end. Though it won't be easy as there are nine different endings. The game features original soundtrack, outstanding art and exciting adventures of the hero in the new parallel world.
